Generated Narrative: SearchParameter serviceRequest-patient-identifier

ServiceRequestPatientIdentifierSearchParameter

Parameter patient.identifier:token

Searches for ServiceRequest by the patient identifier eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?patient.identifier={identifier}

ResourceServiceRequest
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesServiceRequest
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true

name: ServiceRequestPatientIdentifierSearchParameter
description: Searches for ServiceRequest by the patient identifier eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?patient.identifier={identifier}
